title: Learning about flowers
brief_description: An instructional film for primary classes explaining that the main function of flowers is to produce seeds. Identifies some common varieties of flowers including the morning glory, goatsbeard tulip, pussy willow and dogwood. Observes by use of close up time-lapse photography the stages in the growth of a bud, and in the growth of fruits from flowers.
